pull.title: Document assumptions that are being made to avoid NULL pointer dereferences
pull.body:
Document assumptions (via `assert(â€¦)`:s) that are being made avoid `NULL` pointer dereferences.

Rationale:
* Make it clear to human reviewers and non-human static analyzers that what might look like potential `NULL` pointer dereferences are written the way they are intentionally (these cases are currently flagged by various static analyzers).

rename.from: [wallet] Document assumptions that must be fulfilled to avoid NULL pointer dereferences
rename.to: Document assumptions that must be fulfilled to avoid NULL pointer dereferences
